sqlMap.select:
SELECT SERIAL_NO ,ORDER_ID ,SUB_MER_ID ,MER_AMT ,TRANS_FEE ,CLEAR_AMT ,CLEAR_TYPE ,CLEAR_TRACT ,CLEAR_TIME ,CREATE_TIME ,TRANS_TYPE ,SETTLE_DATE ,RESERVED ,CREATE_DATE ,CLEAR_BATCH_NO FROM ORDER_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND ORDER_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(SERIAL_NO) =#serial_no#
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_AMT) =#mer_amt#
(TRANS_FEE) =#trans_fee#
(CLEAR_AMT) =#clear_amt#
(CLEAR_TYPE) Like '%'||(#clear_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_TRACT) Like '%'||(#clear_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_TIME) Like '%'||(#clear_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_BATCH_NO) Like '%'||(#clear_batch_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM ORDER_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND ORDER_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(SERIAL_NO) =#serial_no#
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_AMT) =#mer_amt#
(TRANS_FEE) =#trans_fee#
(CLEAR_AMT) =#clear_amt#
(CLEAR_TYPE) Like '%'||(#clear_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_TRACT) Like '%'||(#clear_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_TIME) Like '%'||(#clear_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_BATCH_NO) Like '%'||(#clear_batch_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
